verbs.description: as former nfl player rae carruth [V: is] released from prison after 18 years for wife death his son who survived the shooting is thriving nineteen years after he was supposed to die at the hands of a hitman hired by his nfl - playing father chancellor lee adams is thriving adams’ mother cherica adams died in december 1999 after rae carruth orchestrated a plot to kill her in charlotte north carolina to avoid paying child support nfl chancellor lee the charlotte observer chancellor lee adams 18 years rae carruth sandra
